mapper.select: SELECT co.COOK_ID , co.BOARD_ID , co.COOK_NAME , co.DESC_DETAIL , m.MEMBER_NAME AS CREATER_NAME , co.CREATE_DATE from cook co INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON m.MEMBER_id=co.CREATER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COOK (COOK_ID, BOARD_ID, COOK_NAME, DESC_DETAIL, CREATER, CREATE_DATE) VALUES( COOK_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 40, #{cook_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc_detail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater, jdbcType=INTEGER}, SYSDATE )
